function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of commitment to 2050 Climate Neutrality goal by Member States","Impact":"Inability to access full Just Transition entitlements, leading to potential financial constraints on transitioning to clean energy","Mitigation":"Encourage and incentivize Member States to commit to the 2050 Climate Neutrality goal through tailored support and funding","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Member States, stakeholders in clean energy transition","Owner":"European Commission, relevant stakeholders"},{"Description":"Concessions on energy infrastructure demands","Impact":"Potential lack of alignment with clean energy goals, leading to increased reliance on non-renewable energy sources","Mitigation":"Balancing energy infrastructure concessions with commitments to transition to clean energy sources, setting clear targets for renewable energy adoption","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy efficiency solutions","People":"Citizens, firms, stakeholders in energy transition","Owner":"National governments, regulatory bodies, energy companies"},{"Description":"Risk of price hikes in food or energy as a consequence of 2050 climate goals","Impact":"Public resistance to climate goals, potential economic strain on individuals and businesses","Mitigation":"Implement policies and measures to mitigate price hikes, educate and communicate the benefits of climate goals to the public, provide support for affected individuals and businesses","Technologies":"Energy-efficient technologies, sustainable agricultural practices","People":"Public, businesses, agricultural sector","Owner":"Government, industry associations, community organizations"}]}
